DOC.brief_summary: The SCOPE study is an observational, multicenter, prospective cohort study aimed at evaluating a 2-year screening programme for CKD in a population of older patients, aged 75 years or more, in seven European Countries, in an attempt to investigate whether and to which extent currently available screening methods may identify older people at risk of worsening kidney function.
DOC.brief_title: Screening for Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) Among Older People Across Europe (SCOPE)
